Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.task

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockAndStopTask
    Task for blocking and stopping a session in one shot.
    BlockTask
    Task for blocking a session.
    CompactTask
    Task to compact ICompactable collections in the ICollectionRegistry.
    EndOfDayTask
    Task to invoke end of the day procedure on all message processors.
    PartyTaskBase
    Useful base for tasks that relate to a particular connection point (and its associated parties).
    ResetTask
    Task to reset sequence numbers.
    ShutdownTask
    Task to shut down a server or HA cluster.
    StartTask
    Task to start trying to connect to a party.
    StopTask
    Task to logout any currently running session.
    TaskBase
    This adds the following to the standard Scheduled implementation Task: Locates the configuration object.
    UnblockAndStartTask
    Task for unblocking and stopping a session in one shot.
    UnblockTask
    Task for unblocking a session.
